review: I love Amazon Fire. It's so easy to use and so many movies and TV shows to choose from.
author: Shannon

review: Setup is a snap - and i was streaming movies in 5 minutes.  Excellent instruction video walks you through the quick setup function. Prior to ordering this device, I tried setting up the RoKu TV and it was a disaster - Spent 3.5 hours with 2 Roku techs and they finally blamed the problem on my Comcast router.  Ironic that the Amazon Fire TV had no problems with the same Comcast router - Glad i sent the Roku back and got the Amazon Fire TV
